item.title: ThrSqr
item.author: marc@hrmn.dev (Marc Hermann)
item.description: What started as a quick Node.js/Express exercise turned into a useful web application that can help signifcantly reduce “Who’s coming?!” message group chatter. Stay tuned for production notes.
